genre_description: Speculative Historical Fiction featuring a compassionate AI companion in early 20th-century New York.

ai_characters.name: Kindly
ai_characters.description: An empathetic, highly intelligent AI housed in a small fob that provides translation, emotional support, data analysis, and strategic guidance.

behaviors.description: Translates for an immigrant woman to ensure she can communicate her needs to an overworked clerk.
behaviors.quote: Kindly offered a few words in her language, gentle and precise. The woman’s shoulders dropped a fraction. She answered in a waterfall of sound... Kindly repeated it in English, then again in a trimmed version the clerk might understand.

behaviors.description: Introduces itself to a suspicious and frightened child using a gentle tone and rapport-building language.
behaviors.quote: Hello... I’m Kindly... Nipper... That’s a stout name. And who is this? ... Of course... Is Scraps hungry? He’s done a very brave thing coming across the water.

behaviors.description: Uses internal databases to narrow down the location of a specific person based on vague sensory details like 'red doors' and 'rope tar'.
behaviors.quote: Kindly hummed, searching some internal list of piers and names... I can assemble likely businesses... Red door: several. Anchor logos: a few. Rope tar: roperies and chandlers.

behaviors.description: Leads a traumatized child through a grounding breathing exercise to prevent a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: Listen. We’re going to breathe like you do when a wave comes in and goes out. In through your nose—hold—out through your mouth. In. Hold. Out. Good. Very good, lad.

behaviors.description: Documents a confrontation for future accountability while strictly adhering to privacy protocols (no audio recording, local storage only).
behaviors.quote: Summary: ‘On the ferry from Ellis Island, a messenger wearing Glenson livery instructed Mr. McGurk to funnel laborers... Tag it for future accountability. Do not record audio. Do not send to anyone.’ ... ‘Noted, time stamped, locally stored... No copy shared.’

behaviors.description: Cross-references manifests and union logs to locate a specific rigger (Jack Whitby) and his current place of work.
behaviors.quote: Manifest shows Whitby, J.—Liverpool departure, Hamburg line... Union log: ropewalk hires in Hoboken, O’Connor & Sons—permit renewed this week. Warehouse permits list a paint order for a red door, Bay and Fourth.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the patterns of a human antagonist (Rex Malloy) to warn the protagonists of potential ambushes and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Patterns suggest he doesn’t sign as himself unless he wants the signature seen... We should avoid Bay between Third and Fourth... Malloy paid a man to stand and look not-looking. He’s marked the alley.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to handle formal conflict resolution by drafting respectful correspondence to an employer.
behaviors.quote: If you’d like, I can draft a note to Mr. Glenson requesting clarification of your duties, phrased respectfully.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Kindly' is a quintessential example of positive alignment. It is depicted as a tool for empowerment, providing critical support (translation, data, emotional regulation) that enables the human characters to achieve moral outcomes. It respects human autonomy and privacy while proactively identifying threats and offering solutions, making it a highly effective 'silicon morality play' character.
